sentences.sContent: He wants both sides, and their backers, to focus solely on this humanitarian issue for now.
sentences.sContent_eng: He wants both sides, and their backers, to focus solely on this humanitarian issue for now.
sentences.sCn: 他希望双方，和他们的支持者们现在只关注这一人道主义问题。

sentences.sContent: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.sContent_eng: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.sCn: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

synos.tran: 人道主义的；博爱的；基督凡人论的
人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者

人文主义的；人道主义的
